Government Tender Announcement
================ Marey

### Details
- **Reference Number** : PW-22-01012378
- **Solicitation Number** : W8482-230997/A
- **Closing Date** : December 13, 2022 @ 2:00 PM EST
- **Contracting Entity** : Department of National Defence
- **Notice Type** : Request for Proposal (RFQ)
- **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Goods or Services** : Check Valves (GSIN: 4820)

### Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of check valves. The required items are detailed below:

| Item # | GSIN: | NSN | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1    | 4820 | 20-012-9365 | VALVE, CHECK | 8          | EACH (EA)       |
|       |      |            |               |            |                |
| 2    | 4820 | 20-012-9365 | VALVE, CHECK | 8          | EACH (EA)       |

### Submission Requirements
- Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide brand name and model number, or Part Number, along with NCAGE.
- Canadian Content: Preference will be given to Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA).
- Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will not be accepted.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Important Contacts
- Jean-Pierre Normandin
- Email: [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: 819-939-3674
